header.company_id_street: C1-7/F., Kin On Commercial Building, 49-51 Jervois Street
header.partner_id_street: No.76 Haichuan Road, Chuangye Zone B, Jiangbei, Ningbo, Zhejiang China
header.name: AP15PO00019
header.amount_total_en: ONE HUNDRED AND THIRTY-NINE THOUSAND, FIVE HUNDRED
header.payment_term_id_name: TT 20% DOWN PAYMENT/80% BALANCE AGAINST DOCUMENTS (CI,PL,BL)
header.certs: ALL PRODUCT MUST CONFORM TO THE DESTINATION MARKET LEGAL REGULATIONS 证书：所有的产品需要有符合目的港法规的证书
header.qc_requirement: IT WILL BE ARRANGED BY THIRD PARTY AND/OR COMPANY STAFF. 验货要求：买方将派验货人员或者第三方做发货前验货
header.load_control: CARTON OR PALLET / FILM / CTN SHIPPING MARK / PALLET SHIPPING MARK 装柜要求：纸箱或者托盘/塑封/外箱唛头/托盘唛头
header.penalties_on_delays: 1 WEEK DELAY ACCORDING TO PROFORMA DELIVER TIME = 0.5% OF PROFORMA'S AMOUNT PENALTY 交期延期的惩罚：1个礼拜延期， 罚金=0.5%合同金额 2 WEEKS DELAY ACCORDING TO PROFORMA DELIVERY TIME = 1% OF PROFORMA'S AMOUNT PENALTY 2个礼拜延期， 罚金=1%合同金额 3 WEEKS DELAY ACCORDING TO PROFORMA DELIVERY TIME = 2% OF PROFORMA'S AMOUNT PENALTY 3个礼拜延期， 罚金=2%合同金额
header.discrepancy: IN CASE OF QUANTITY DISCREPANCY CLAIM SHOULD BE FILED BY THE BUYER NOT LATER THAN 2 MONTHS AFTER BL DATE, IN CASE OF QUALITY 不符：如果有数量不符，买方需要在提单后两个月内申明；如果有质量不符，买方需要在ETA之后三个月内申明； Credit Note将由买方撰写 DISCREPANCY CLAIM SHOULD BE FILLED BY BUYER WITHIN 3 MONTHS AFTER THE ETA NOTIFICATION. CREDIT NOTE WILL BE ISSUED BY SELLER.
header.disputes: ALL DISPUTES ARISING FROM THE EXECUTION OF THIS CONTRACT WILL BE SETTLED AMICABLY THROUGH 争议：合同双方提出的异议应该友好的协商解决，如果不能达成一致，那么参照合同文本来执行 FRIENDLY NEGOTIATION. IN CASE NO SETTLEMENT CAN BE REACHED, THE CASE SHOULD BE DISPUTED ACCORDING TO THE TERMS OF BASIC CONTRACT.
header.doc_export: THE SELLER IS RESPONSIBLE OF THE EXPORTATION BY PREPARING ALL THE SHIPPING DOCUMENTS. THE SELLER MUST SEND 出口文件：卖方负责提供所有的出口需要的文件及复印件，包括CI,PL,Bl和CO；如果是信用证交易，卖方需要遵守交易要求 BY EMAIL THE BATCH OF DOCUMENTS INCLUDING CI, PL AND BL TELEX RELEASE. IN CASE THE BL TELEX RELEASE IS NOT REQUESTED THE SELLER MUST BE SENT A BATCH OF 3 ORIGINAL COPY OF CI, PL, BL AND CO IF REQUESTED. IN CASE OF LC SELLER MUST FOLLOW LC TERMS.
header.confirmation: THE SELLER IS REQUESTED TO SIGN AND RETURN ONE COPY OF SALES CONFIRMATION IMMEDIATELY AFTER RECEIVING THE PRESENT. 回执：卖方收到此合同需马上签字确认，如果5日内没有收到反馈，将默认卖方接受此协议 IN CASE THE PRESENT CONTRACT IS NOT RETURN BY THE SELLER WITHIN 5 WORKING DAYS AFTER RECEIVING DATE, IT IS UNDERSTOOD, THAT THE SELLER HAS ACCEPTED THE TEMRS AND CONDITIONS OF THE PRESENT CONTRACT.
